message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I know you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $11,500. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000, but that's my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
